_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

TenderReceipt.description: A document sent by a contracting party to an economic operator acknowledging receipt of a Tender.

TenderReceipt.title: Tender Receipt. Details
TenderReceipt.description: A document sent by a contracting party to an economic operator acknowledging receipt of a Tender.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Tender Receipt. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Tender Receipt. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Tender Receipt. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Tender Receipt. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Tender Receipt. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Tender Receipt. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Tender Receipt. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Tender Receipt. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Tender Receipt. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Tender Receipt. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ContractName.title: Tender Receipt. Contract Name. Text
ContractName.description: Short title of a contract associated with this Tender.

Note.title: Tender Receipt. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

RegisteredDate.title: Tender Receipt. Registered Date. Date
RegisteredDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which the Tender Receipt was created.

RegisteredTime.title: Tender Receipt. Registered Time. Time
RegisteredTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which the Tender Receipt was created.

TenderDocumentReference.title: Tender Receipt. Tender_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TenderDocumentReference.description: A reference to a received Tender.

Signature.title: Tender Receipt. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
